job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Software Engineer, Totogi (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Totogi is on the lookout for tech trailblazers ready to dive headfirst into the next wave of software development with AI as their co-pilot. Think less routine, more innovation. Here, AI isn't just another tool-it's your sidekick, elevating your coding skills to superhero status. Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.

   This role is all about pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development. You'll be instrumental in crafting AI tools that clarify complex concepts, employing the latest in technology to upgrade your coding skills to superhero-level. Your objective is to elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.

   Totogi values driven, curious, and innovative individuals ready to explore new horizons. We're charting a course towards a new way of working, with AI as our guide. Are you up for the challenge?

   What you will be doing

     * Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
     * Crafting AI-generated summaries to streamline knowledge across products, domains, or corporate intelligence, boosting team efficiency.
     * Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Dwelling on manual debugging. With AI, identify and resolve issues swiftly, leaving outdated methods behind.
     * Getting caught in the management trap. Concentrate on what you do best-coding and creating innovative solutions-rather than getting sidetracked by managerial tasks., * Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI as a tool to enhance existing software development processes and productivity rather than building, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models themselves. It lacks specific details on core AI engineering tasks like model development, MLOps, or data engineering.

phrases.phrase: elevate our enterprise software solutions, ensuring they lead the market in innovation, user satisfaction, and overall experience.
phrases.justification: This phrase describes the goal of improving existing software solutions to achieve market leadership, user satisfaction, and a better overall experience, which aligns with understanding and aligning technical work with business objectives.

phrases.phrase: elevating your coding skills to superhero status.
phrases.justification: This phrase suggests using AI to improve the effectiveness and capabilities of developers, which is a business-oriented goal of enhancing productivity and skill.

phrases.phrase: clarify complex concepts
phrases.justification: This indicates a business need to simplify information, likely for users or internal teams, which requires understanding the business context of the concepts.

phrases.phrase: boosting team efficiency.
phrases.justification: This directly relates to improving business operations and productivity through AI-powered tools.

phrases.phrase: Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction for Totogi's product suite.
phrases.justification: This is a clear statement of business objectives related to innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction, driven by AI integration.

phrases.phrase: AI-First Software Engineer
phrases.justification: The title itself indicates a focus on software engineering, with AI being a primary consideration.

phrases.phrase: elevating your coding skills to superhero status.
phrases.justification: This implies the use of AI to enhance the process of writing code, which is a core software development activity.

phrases.phrase: Imagine conjuring code like magic, predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge, and delivering groundbreaking solutions that leave customers in awe.
phrases.justification: This describes the application of AI to improve the software development lifecycle, including code generation, bug prediction, and solution delivery.

phrases.phrase: Implementing AI from the ground up in projects, enhancing everything from feature development to problem-solving.
phrases.justification: This directly states the implementation of AI within software projects to improve feature development and problem-solving, which are software engineering tasks.

phrases.phrase: Showcasing the power of AI in improving software development processes, emphasizing its role as a booster, not a replacement.
phrases.justification: This highlights the use of AI to augment and improve the existing software development workflow.

phrases.phrase: predicting and squashing bugs before they even emerge
phrases.justification: This implies a proactive approach to identifying and resolving issues, which is a form of problem-solving.

phrases.phrase: problem-solving
phrases.justification: Explicitly mentioned as an area where AI will be implemented to enhance capabilities.

phrases.phrase: tech trailblazers
phrases.justification: Suggests individuals who are forward-thinking and willing to explore new technologies and approaches.

phrases.phrase: Think less routine, more innovation.
phrases.justification: Emphasizes a focus on creative and novel approaches rather than standard procedures.

phrases.phrase: pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development.
phrases.justification: Indicates a drive to explore new frontiers and achieve novel outcomes.

phrases.phrase: innovative individuals
phrases.justification: Directly calls for people who are creative and generate new ideas.

phrases.phrase: explore new horizons.
phrases.justification: Suggests a proactive and adventurous approach to work and technology.

phrases.phrase: groundbreaking solutions
phrases.justification: Implies the creation of novel and impactful outcomes.

phrases.phrase: Drive the integration of AI into our development process, setting new standards in innovation, efficiency, and customer satisfaction
phrases.justification: This highlights a proactive role in leading and establishing new, innovative practices.

phrases.phrase: AI as their co-pilot.
phrases.justification: Suggests a willingness to work with and learn from AI tools.

phrases.phrase: elevating your coding skills to superhero status.
phrases.justification: Implies a desire for continuous improvement and skill enhancement through new methods.

phrases.phrase: employing the latest in technology
phrases.justification: Indicates a focus on staying current with and utilizing new technological advancements.

phrases.phrase: curious
phrases.justification: Directly calls for individuals who are eager to learn and explore.

phrases.phrase: Are you up for the challenge?
phrases.justification: Implies a readiness to tackle new and potentially difficult tasks, requiring adaptability.
